EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-05-Field-West-RD-Sponsored-Los-Angeles.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: LA Lakers vs Portland Trailblazers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Los Angeles for a presentation on workload automation at the Ritz Carlton LA followed by an evening of basketball as the LA Lakers take on the Portland Trailblazer at the Staples Center. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth.
Executive Networking Series Los Angeles Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud LA Lakers vs Portland Trailblazers Monday, March 5th | Ritz Carlton LA | 6:00 p.m.
Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Save the date for March 5th at 6:00 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-losangeles/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
